parameters.name: BillOwnerId
parameters.description: The ID of the member. If you specify a value for this parameter, you can query the split bills of the specified member. If you leave this parameter empty, the split bills of the current account are queried by default.

parameters.name: BillingCycle
parameters.description: The billing cycle, in the YYYY-MM format.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 300.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description: The billing method. Valid values: Subscription: subscription PayAsYouGo: pay-as-you-go This parameter must be used together with the ProductCode parameter.
